Hayleys Advantis IL Cluster Employee Happiness Index Survey 2023 - Phase 2

pages.title: Employee Happiness Index Surve - Score Heat Map
pages.desc: Score heat map for each question category

pages.title: EHI - Score Trend
pages.desc: Score variation of the responses based on different question categories

pages.title: Employee Happiness Index (EHI) survey overall responses
pages.desc: This report provides a detailed breakdown of responses for each question. It offers insights into how participants answered each question, allowing for a comprehensive analysis of the survey data

cards.title: Pie Charts
cards.desc: Overall analytics for each question in pie chart view.

cards.title: Summary Table
cards.desc: Overall analytics for each question in tabular view.

pages.title: Employee Happiness Index (EHI) survey comment analysis
pages.desc: Analyze sentiment of the comments and categorize the comments received using Machined Learning (ML) algorithms. Disclaimer: This ML-based machined learning technique can have 5% of false positives or false negatives

cards.title: Sentiment Analysis
cards.desc: Analyze sentiment of the comments received to the survey.

cards.title: Comment categories & sentiment
cards.desc: Categories & sentiments of the comments received to the survey by all the respondents

pages.title: Employee Happiness Index (EHI) survey individual responses
pages.desc: The Individual Responses feature enables users to access and download raw survey data in CSV format, including respondents' answers to all survey questions and any open-ended comments

pages.title: Employee Happiness Index (EHI) survey correlation analytics
pages.desc: This report illustrates responses across SBUs to identify correlations between questions.

pages.title: Employee Happiness Index (EHI) survey engagement
pages.desc: This report provides an overview of the employee engagement rates in relation to the EHI survey.

pages.title: Employee Happiness Index (EHI) survey comparison analytics
pages.desc: Employee happiness index survey analytics compared based on different parameters

cards.title: SBU-wise analytics comparison
cards.desc: The survey analytics are presented by comparing them with the data from IL cluster business units (SUBs), allowing for a comparative analysis of the results

cards.title: Department-wise analytics comparison
cards.desc: Survey data graphed by respondent departments offers valuable insights into data distribution across different departments

cards.title: Age-wise analytics comparison
cards.desc: The survey data is categorized based on age groups, enabling meaningful insights into the distribution of responses across different age demographics

cards.title: Gender-wise analytics comparison
cards.desc: The survey data is categorized by gender, providing valuable insights into response patterns based on different genders
